Title: Illuminated Frontispiece of Geometrical Design
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.554 contains a full-page illuminated frontispiece with a geometrical decoration in gold and blue that has a marginal palmette at left which is cropped.
Keywords: Abbasid; Arabic; Binding; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Islamic; Koran; Manuscript; Qur`an; Central Arab Lands (Near East); Kufic; Early Abbasid script
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
